name: Self Heimlich Maneuver
description: Perform Heimlich on yourself when alone
warning: Use when choking and alone. Call 911 if possible first.
emergency_notes: Use firm surface if fist method doesn't work
Bend over hard surface and thrust

steps.title: Recognize Choking
steps.voice_prompt: If you cannot cough, speak, or breathe, you are choking.

steps.title: Make a Fist
steps.voice_prompt: Make a fist above your navel. Grasp it with your other hand.

steps.title: Perform Self Thrusts
steps.description: Quick upward thrusts into your abdomen
steps.voice_prompt: Thrust your fist inward and upward into your abdomen. Repeat until object comes out.
steps.critical_warning: Use forceful thrusts - your life depends on it

steps.title: Alternative: Use Chair or Counter
steps.description: If fist method fails, use firm surface
detailed_instructions: Find chair back or counter edge
steps.voice_prompt: If fist method doesn't work, use a chair back or counter. Press your abdomen against it and thrust upward.
